title: Warburg Pincus takes stake in Swiss tech firm Scandit in unicorn hunt - Reuters
content: Warburg Pincus takes stake in Swiss tech firm Scandit in unicorn hunt  Reuters
description: Warburg Pincus (WP.UL) has taken a stake in Swiss barcode scanning firm Scandit as part of a $150 million capital raise in which the U.S. buyout fund will invest in a European tech unicorn amid bumper growth in the region's herd of billion-dollar tech start-ups.
